attributes.action: people of Scotland want to know why all nuclear weapons-Subs are stored here ?
attributes.additional_details: No evidence required, faselane and Rosyth naval bases are enough evidence
attributes.background: The people of Scotland would like to hear the UK prime minister (David Cameron) explain to us why all nuclear weapons and submarines new and old are stored in Scotland along with most nuclear waste, why if Scotland does not want these materials stored here by a unelected government they remain ?
